raw_comment: I noticed that the younger generations usually have a more positive view on the question of if the world is becoming a better place. A reason why some older generations may not think that the world has gotten much better place to live may be that things seemed better for them while they were growing up.
ace_sentences: Younger generations usually have a more positive view about the question whether the world is becoming a better place.
Some older generations may not think that the world has become a much better place to live.
Things seemed better for these older generations while they were growing up.
This fact may be a reason why some older generations do not think that the world has become a much better place to live.
